00031 StochasticWntCellCycleModel::StochasticWntCellCycleModel(unsigned dimension)
00032     : WntCellCycleModel(dimension)
00033 {
00034 }

00037 StochasticWntCellCycleModel::StochasticWntCellCycleModel(const std::vector<double>& rParentProteinConcentrations,
00038                                                          const CellMutationState& rMutationState,
00039                                                          const unsigned& rDimension)
00040     : WntCellCycleModel(rParentProteinConcentrations, rMutationState, rDimension)

00044 
00045 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::SetG2Duration()
00046 {
00047     TissueConfig *p_config = TissueConfig::Instance();
00048     RandomNumberGenerator *p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00049 
00050     double mean = p_config->GetG2Duration();
00051     double standard_deviation = 0.9;
00052 
00053     mG2Duration = p_gen->NormalRandomDeviate(mean, standard_deviation);
00054 
00055     // Check that the normal random deviate has not returned a small or negative G2 duration
00056     if (mG2Duration < p_config->GetMinimumGapDuration())
00057     {
00058         #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00059         mG2Duration = p_config->GetMinimumGapDuration();
00060         #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell()
00066 {
00067     SetG2Duration();
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::Initialise()
00072 {
00073     WntCellCycleModel::Initialise();
00074     SetG2Duration();
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 void StochasticWntCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00079 {
00080     AbstractWntOdeBasedCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00081     SetG2Duration();
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 double StochasticWntCellCycleModel::GetG2Duration()
00086 {
00087     return mG2Duration;
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticWntCellCycleModel::CreateCellCycleModel()
00092 {
00093     return new StochasticWntCellCycleModel(*this);
00094 }
